fields.name: Skip_the_competitive_RFP_process_and_move_directly_to_Recommendation_Form
fields.fieldText: Skip the RFP process and move directly to Recommendation form.

fields.name: Skip_RFP_note
fields.fieldText:
Note: Only Skip the RFP Process if you can do a direct hiring under the exceptions and if you currently have the Law Firm's quote to upload.

Be aware, if you are hiring both Local and International Counsel and you need the RFP for one of the counsels, please do the competitive RFP process in a separate request.

fields.name: Transaction_Matter_Name
fields.fieldText: Transaction/Matter Name

fields.name: Matter_Description_Inst
fields.fieldText: Matter Description

fields.name: Description_Deal_type
fields.fieldText:
﻿Institutional matter: A matter that is internal to IDB/IDB Invest (e.g. labor dispute) or where the legal services sought are for the benefit of IDB/IDB Invest in one or multiple transactions (e.g. legal opinions). All matters originated by the Compliance or Institutional and Corporate units are considered Institutional for these purposes


﻿Operations: A financing operation in which IDB/IDB Invest is the lender / issuer/guarantor/investor. For purposes of this document, operations listed in Maestro should be considered as “Transactions” by default
